column4: Neither nvidia-settings nor displayconfig give me the option of setting my LCD tv to 1920x1080. I know the hardware works in Windows, how do I get it to work in Ubuntu (geforce 7600) ?
It seems like it's an ongoing problem wiht no solution on ubuntuforums.org.
i had lots of problems with my 7600 and displayconfig-gtk. i recommend trying nvidia-settings to write your xorg.conf.
it means you are missing the PGP key for that APT repository
